All Classes

Class Description
AdministratorView  
BaseProduct
Model class used to represent a basic product.
Client
Model class used to represent a client.
ClientView  
CompositeProduct
Model class used to represent a compound product.
DeliveryService
DeliveryService class Class that implements the IDeliveryServiceProcessing, and it contains the main operations executed by the administrator and the client
Employee
Employee class This class is responsible with the Observer method update, which announces the employee when an order was placed
FileWriter
FileWriter class Class responsible with serializing the products, the clients and the orders every time a change takes place in the deliveryService
IDeliveryServiceProcessing  
MainView
Interface class This class manages the tools that generate the graphical user interface
MenuItem
Abstract class used to represent a product.
Observable
Observable class Class responsible of informing all the observers about any change, as well as adding or removing any observers
Observer  
Order
Model class used to represent an order.
Serializator<T>
Serializator class Generic class responsible with managing the "database".
Start
Main class - initializes the user interface
TableManager
Class that contains two methods, used to display the table for each object table.
Validator
Validator class, used to check the format of a product and a client object.
